data.title: Awesome Burgers
data.text:
If you like a good, greasy burger, then this is your place!  I came here with my husband for dinner and were greeted as we entered the front door.  A large board sits on the wall with the list of all the "add ons" that can be put onto a burger. Your burger is made to order.  We added a regular order of fries, which was plenty for the two of us.  We were also to to pick a dipping sauce for our fries. Though there were many from which to choose, I go with the old favorite, ketchup!

We waited a short time for our order.  Our burgers were brought in a bag and they were hot and ready to eat.  The burgers were delicious, though a bit on the greasy side.  This was a great meal and we will return.

data.title: Fantastic Burgers
data.text: We ate there on Saturday and it was sooooo delicious, ate inside. We ordered there on Wednesday and brought it home, the burger was soggy, not so good. I would suggest when taking out orders to get them on the side and put it together once you're home and ready to eat it.

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: I love this burger place and now so convenient to Broken Arrow.  The manager is friendly as is the staff.  The taste is wonderful.

data.title: Overall, Not As Good As I Had Hoped
data.text:
We decided to try this place since we were hungry for a good burger. My wife ordered the bacon burger without the bun (gluten-free) at $6.69. I ordered the Sweet Caroline at $7.29. The kids cheeseburger was $4.09. Upon Nicole’s suggestion (cash resister/server) we ordered a large order of fries ($4.59) and they were more than what all of us could finish. A large soda was $2.79. 

We picked a table and our food was brought out in a few moments. There are TVs in every direction. The kids and I enjoyed our burgers. My wife was unable to finish her burger due to the amount of grease. 

Overall, I think a person gets a better burger from Red Robin than at Fat Guys.

data.title: Now you don't have to travel to Tulsa for delicious burgers
data.text: Love the downtown Fat Guys, so I was ecstatic to learn one was opening up in BA.  Spacious location with outdoor seating, and plenty of parking available (hallelujah after that minimal parking available in downtown).  Same great menu and same great service, but without having to travel quite as far.  Love this place, and glad you guys are close to home now!

data.title: WONDERFUL BURGERS AND FRIES
data.text: Have been to fat guys several times since their opening. If you like a well made tasty burger then this is the place for you, but I have to say if one is not a fan of a slightly greasy juicy burger then maybe not the place for you. I grew up in a small town that had a couple of what was called greasy spoon burger places and I have searched out those places for my burgers over the years. Their fries are fresh cut and come out hot and plentiful with several choices for dipping sauces. If very hungry I suggest ordering the larger burgers they offer, but for me the standard double meat fat burger works with a large fry my wife and I share. The place is clean and they have large tv monitors around. The service is good and the staff friendly. The prices are reasonable for a good burger and fry. I recommend a visit...

data.title: Yum!!!
data.text:
Fat Guys latest restaurant, great stuff!!! Great burgers, great fries, great drinks!!!
The restaurant was a bit warm, but everything else wonderful!!! We'll be back for sure!!!

data.title: Excellent!
data.text:
We have tried many of the large chains of burger restaurants that you walk up and order and this is the best!  Burgers are large and juicy.  They have about 15 toppings you can add for no additional charge.  The regular order of fries could easily feed 3 people and they have about 15 different sauces for them.  They have a good selection of beer, wine, shakes made with Blue Bell ice cream and self-serve sodas.  

They have both indoor and outdoor seating, but they need to provide some sort of shade or umbrellas over the table for it to comfortable in the afternoon heat.  This is a new location for this chain and we will definitely return often.
